item.title: Docs: EVM
item.description:
evm documentation

Evm Support

1. metamask (for account)

  • sherpax mainnet
Network Name: sherpax-mainnet
New RPC URL: https://mainnet.sherpax.io/rpc
Chain ID: 1506
Currency Symbol: KSX
Block Explorer URL: https://evm.sherpax.io/
  • sherpax testnet
Network Name: sherpax-testnet
New RPC URL: https://sherpax-testnet.chainx.org/rpc
Chain ID: 1507
Currency Symbol: KSX
Block Explorer URL: https://evm-pre.sherpax.io/

Refer Connect MetaMask to Moonbase Alpha

2. Remix (for contract)

Refer Interacting with Moonbeam Using Remix

3. Ethereum apis

  • Ethereum JSON-RPC.postman_collection
  • Ethereum RPC Support
  • QuickNode Ethereum RPC
  • Ethereum JSON-RPC Wiki

4. frontier account

How does frontier manage the substrate account and ethereum account
